member.name: P:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.State
member.summary: Gets state of the bus.

member.name: P:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.EnableLoggingOnBusOnly
member.summary: Returns true if logging is enabled, otherwise returns false. Set true for enable logging, otherwise set false. It controls logging of bus only. It doesn't control logging of hosts.

member.name: P:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.CurentImage
member.summary: Returns current image.

member.name: P:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.IsRunning
member.summary: Returns true if the bus and its hosts is running, otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the bus and its hosts based on target image called on image name. The bus will not start after loading. You can make it later.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.Start
member.summary: Starts the bus and its hosts based on current image or source files (if still there are not images). Creates new image if still there are not images.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.Start(System.String)
member.summary: Starts the bus and its hosts based on target image called on image name.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.Stop
member.summary: Stops the bus and its hosts without saving its states to current image.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.Save
member.summary: Saves state of the bus and its hosts to current image. This image will be stopped before saving.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.Save(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves state of the bus and its hosts to target image called on image name. If target image doesn't exist it will be created otherwise existing image will be rewritten. This image will be stopped before saving.
member.param: Set true if you need set new image as current, otherwise set false.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.StopAndSave
member.summary: Stops the bus and its hosts and saves their to current image.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.StopAndSave(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Stops the bus and its hosts and saves their to target image called on image name. If target image doesn't exist it will be created otherwise existing image will be rewritten.
member.param: Set true if you need set new image as current, otherwise set false.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.ClearImage
member.summary: Clears all information into current image without its deleting. This image will be stopped before cleaning. After starting this image will be initialized from source files.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.ClearImage(System.String)
member.summary: Clears all information into target image called on image name without its deleting. This image will be stopped before cleaning. After starting this image will be initialized from source files.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.RemoveImage
member.summary: Removes current image. This image will be stopped before cleaning.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.RemoveImage(System.String)
member.summary: Removes target image called on image name.

member.name: M:GnuClayUnity3DHost.BusSystem.BusOfHosts.GetAllImages
member.summary: Returns all available images on the base directory.
member.returns: List of all available images on the base directory.
